content: रसनं [रस्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Crying, screaming, roaring, sounding, tinkling, noise or sound in general. {@--2@} Thunder, rumbling or muttering of clouds. {@--3@} Taste, flavour. {@--4@} The organ of taste, the tongue; इंद्रियं रसग्राहकं रसनं जिह्वाग्रवर्ति <ls>T. S.</ls>; <ls>Bg. 15. 9.</ls> {@--5@} Perception, appreciation, sense; सर्वेऽपि रसनाद्रसाः <ls>S. D. 244.</ls> --नः Phlegm.
